about_the_game:
prologue:

Mar'owahn, the Wargod, is summoned. But, something is off... The realm he arrives at is nearing its end, yet war still rages. All he can do is push forward in order to discover his fate, his role, and to learn of the agents of the coming Calamity.
A fine-tuned turn-based RPG with an emphasis on strategy and survival. Battle against evil forces ranging from corrupted warriors to awe-inspiring powerful wizards.
Experience the world's Shattering and the Assault on Zea Q'arna Citadel!

With 6 characters, 7 playable classes, 10 magic schools available and over a hundred skills to use, choose your favourite combination and approach to victory! Only through victory will you unravel the mystery of the world's demise!
This Demo and Prologue to Legend of the Wargod's story contains:
  • World exploration and interactions.
  • The prelude to an epic story that spawns several worlds and realms.
  • A robust Turn-based Combat system with class attacks, defensive skills and various magic skills.
  • UNLEASH your ultimate abilities through the Battle Instinct!
  • CHANGE party members mid-combat and get backup when your allies fall.
  • Gain EXPERIENCE and LEVEL UP as a party.
  • BUY and SELL items and equip your party with weapons and gear.
  • UPGRADE your classes and magic schools by using their skills in battle.
  • SAVE your progress and LOAD to pick up where you left off!

short_description: A story-driven turn-based RPG focused on strategy and survival. Explore and battle in a dark ancient fantasy world full of kings, honorbound soldiers, ruthless bandits, powerful wizards, terrible creatures, and deep arcane forces.
